name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interview AI - Ace your coding interviews with ease!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ace your coding interviews with ease! Perfect for developers at all levels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Land your dream job with ease!
Tired of getting stuck during coding interviews? 😵‍💫 Meet your new best friend: CodeCrush 🌟—the Chrome plugin that helps you crack coding problems like a pro!
👉 Real-time hints 🧠
👉 Coding patterns & strategies 🛠️
👉 Improve your problem-solving game 🎯

✨ Install now and turn your coding interviews into a piece of cake! 🎂
Chrome Web Store Description
🔑 CodeCrush: Unlock Your Coding Interview Potential!
Level up your coding interview prep with CodeCrush, the ultimate Chrome plugin designed to help you land your dream job. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned developer, this plugin provides:
✅ Real-time problem hints 🧩
✅ Guidance on common coding patterns 📖
✅ Tips for debugging and optimization 🛠️
✅ A smooth, distraction-free interface 🎨
